nodes.text: The Seventh Army, also known as Golden Nyss Command, was a Republic and later Imperial Sector Army charged with the defense of the Immalia Oversector.

During the Clone Wars, the 7th Sector Army was primarily a defensive command, charged with patrolling the Namadii Corridor as far as Ansion and the broad sweep of space between Dorin and Bogden. The Seventh also was frequently on standby to support the 5th Sector Army against threats from the Unknown Regions, and conducted secret scouting missions beyond the frontier.
